title: Wheeling National Heritage Area: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           1400 Main Street  Wheeling, WV 26003                 Directions         We are located at 1400 Main Street, Wheeling, WV 26003.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Wheeling National Heritage Area The area is open to the public all-day, every day.   Standard Hours    Sunday: Open 24 hours   Monday: Open 24 hours   Tuesday: Open 24 hours   Wednesday: Open 24 hours   Thursday: Open 24 hours   Friday: Open 24 hours   Saturday: Open 24 hours             Weather           Over a year, the temperatures vary from low 20s to mid 80s, typically. This area is very humid and has no dry season.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Wheeling Entrance Fee - $0.00 There is no entrance fee for Wheeling National Heritage Area, though some associated organizations may charge individual fees.         Visitor Centers                  The great 1849 suspension bridge of Wheeling extended the National Road west, bringing people and goods to the city. At the northernmost navigable port on the Ohio River, overland routes, river traffic, and railroads converged, attracting entrepreneurs who manufactured iron, steel, nails, textiles, glass, tobacco, and other goods.  The Wheeling National Heritage Area preserves and celebrates the city’s dramatic setting, resources, and history, including its role as the birthplace of the state of West Virginia during the Civil War. For more information, visit: http://wheelingheritage.org/
